### Load Data {-}

```{r, cache=T}
loadData <- function(folderName, fileName, ...) {
  if (.Platform$OS.type == "windows") {
  dataPath = "D:/Data"
  } else {
    dataPath = "/media/kory/DATA/Data"
  }
  file = paste(dataPath, folderName, fileName, sep="/")
  data.table::fread(file, ...)
}
```
